price: Pa ti se okreni od njih i reci: “Selam!” Sigurno će oni znati!
arabic: فَٱصۡفَحۡ عَنۡهُمۡ وَقُلۡ سَلَٰمٞۚ فَسَوۡفَ يَعۡلَمُونَ

version.title: Bosnian translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Bosnian by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: fa-iṣ'faḥ ʿanhum waqul salāmun fasawfa yaʿlamūna
